article.description: Oliver McNally scored 20 points and Christian Webster added 17 to help Harvard defeat Worcester Tech 69-54 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Oliver McNally's 20 push Harvard past Worcester Tech
article.linkText: McNally's 20 push Harvard past Worcester Tech
article.story: BOSTON -- Oliver McNally scored 20 points and Christian Webster added 17 to help Harvard defeat Worcester Tech 69-54 on Tuesday night. The Crimson (6-2) shot 11 for 22 in the opening half, including 8 of 15 from 3-point range (53.3 percent) to take a 38-25 halftime lead. McNally nailed a 3 with 16:13 left to play in the second, extending Harvard's lead to 47-32. Jeffrey Robinson scored 16 points to lead the Engineers (5-2), while Jaime Shannon added 11. Worcester Tech pulled within eight, 54-46, with 11:02 to play, but five straight Crimson points pushed their lead back to 13. Harvard shot 28 of 34 from the free-throw line (82.4 percent) and 16 for 36 from the floor (44.4 percent). McNally was 8 for 8 and Webster finished 10 for 10 from the free-throw line. Brandyn Curry scored 11 points, while Keith Wright added 10 points and nine rebounds for the Crimson.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
